title: We May Have Found The GOAT Podcast Guest | Fantasy Football Guru Paul Charchian Ascends to Tasting Lore
itunes:title: We May Have Found The GOAT Podcast Guest | Fantasy Football Guru Paul Charchian Ascends to Tasting Lore
description:
When the show's first threepeet guest appears on the show, there's a certain expectation that they will remember their tasting skills. Fantasy Football guru Paul Charchian proves himself worthy on this week's episode. His tasting skills have improved since our last 14-pour tasting. We talk fantasy football underdogs, rare bourbons and more. 

Charch's Fantasy Football Picks: https://guillotineleagues.com/public/charchranks

Guilloten Leagues: https://guillotineleagues.com/

Blind Tasting Lineup

A) Penelope Barrel Strength 

B) Chicken Cock 20 Year Rye

C) Proof & Wood Vertigo 

D) Barrell Seagrass

E) Uncle Nearest 1820

F) Elijah Craig Barrel Proof A 122
